pullRequest.title: Handle expections when finding file references to delete
pullRequest.bodyText:
If we get an exception when getting file references to delete catch
exception and continue with other applications, as we want to make
sure this is done even in case of some (transient) failure.

commit.message:
Handle expections when finding file references to delete

If we get an exception when getting file references to delete catch
exception and continue with other applications, as we want to make
sure this is done even in case of some (transient) failure
Catch exception also when trying to get application
